00090 // double calculateEvaluation(void) method
00091 
00094 
00095 double RosenbrockFunction::calculateEvaluation(void)
00096 {
00097    // Control sentence (if debug)
00098 
00099    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00100 
00101    if(multilayerPerceptron == NULL)
00102    {
00103       std::cerr << std::endl
00104                 << "Flood Error: RosenbrockFunction class." << std::endl
00105                 << "double calculateEvaluation(void) method." << std::endl
00106                 << "Pointer to multilayer perceptron object cannot be NULL." << std::endl
00107                 << std::endl;
00108 
00109       exit(1);
00110    }
00111 
00112    #endif
00113 
00114    numberOfEvaluations++;
00115 
00116    double evaluation = 0.0;
00117 
00118    Vector<double> argument = multilayerPerceptron->getIndependentParameters();
00119 
00120    // Get evaluation
00121 
00122    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfVariables-1; i++)
00123    {
00124       evaluation += 100.0*pow(argument[i+1] - pow(argument[i],2), 2) + pow(1.0 - argument[i], 2);
00125    }
00126 
00127    return(evaluation);
00128 }
00129 
00130 }
